text: Add Â½ kg rava (suji) and 500 ml curd into the bowl.
Add all chopped vegetables (onion, tomato, chillies, coriander).
Add salt and water into the bowl.
After resting, the batter is ready.
Add soda just before making uttapams.
Heat a pan on medium flame.
Add 1 tbsp oil to the pan.
Pour 70â€“80 ml batter onto the pan.
Spread gently without making too thin.
Flip and cook for another 30â€“40 seconds.
